attributes.description:
Brad New Opel Corsa
Standard Service plan of 3 years or 45 000km's
Standard Warranty of 3 Years or 120 000km's
Service intervals every 15 000km's or 12 months
OPEL's attention to detail comes to life in the new OPEL Corsa. Its distinctive new looks include its lowered, yet luxuriously longer bonnet with a steeper windscreen, resulting in a modern lower roofline – and dynamic stance on the road!
EXQUISITE INTERIOR
Performance style-design accents are visible throughout the new Corsa’s ergonomic interior with luxurious ambient lighting, such as clear and concise Driver Instrument Clusters and the flat-bottom steering wheel.
STYLISH ALLOY WHEELS
Styllish 16-inch alloy wheels to selected models to take you from the showroom into the spotlight!
180° PANORAMIC REAR-VIEW CAMERA
Reversing just got safer and easier, especially in the city and narrow parking spaces. The Panoramic Rear-View Camera provides a 180° overhead view of the back of your Corsa and what's around it. You'll be a reversing pro before you know it.
Experience a high level of connectivity with the new OPEL Corsa! It boasts a 7” IntelliLink Touchscreen Infotainment System with Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™.
OPEL Corsa offers a total of 6 airbags including driver, passenger, side and curtain airbags to contribute towards the overall safety of your new Corsa and its occupants.
ISOFIX Child Seat Anchorage.
MULTI-FUNCTION STEERING WHEEL
Performance and style combine in the new OPEL Corsa, resulting in elegant driver en

Toyota Corolla 1.4 D4d PRESTIGE. vechile comes with a full service history and spare keys. new tyres fitted so nothing to spend. electric mirrors, windows, power steering and is very very light on fuel. this sedan is a real family vechile and comes with a 6 speed manual. Extended 2-year warranty available to purchase for all vehicles purchased from us.
We can arrange vehicle finance and assist with trade ins.   
Terms and Conditions apply.
Please call Paul on 0829527479  to view by appointment only.

PLEASE NOTE....All our vehicles are priced to sell and exclude on the road fees.

For your Peace of Mind and Ours - We are fully compliant with the Health and Safety measures relating to Covid 19 with all our vehicles fully disinfected after each viewing or test drive, Hand Sanitizer on arrival for all people entering and face masks worn by all. The social distancing rule of 2m is easily adhered to as we have a spacious lot, and it is outdoors too, so call us right away for a comfortable viewing by appointment only.
